name: Ishar: Legend of the Fortress
description:
ISHAR a mysterious Fortress haunted by a brooding evil, spreading corruption and decay throughout the Kingdom.

Discover the world of Ishar, the new benchmark for all Role-Playing games.

* More than 100000 views with footstep by footstep updates of the landscape. Exceptional 3D graphics with both indoor and outdoor scenes.

* Choose and modify your own team and team characteristics : invite characters you meet to join you.

* Adventure and combat - hundreds of enemies !

* Flexible and user-friendly gameplay : accessible for begginers, challenging to experts.

* Many ways to play and win the game.

* Exploit character psychology... use loyalty, treachery and seduction to your advantage.

* Includes marvelous medieval city with markets, hostelries and training academies (spell casting, swordsman ship, hand-to-hand combat etc...).

* Over 40 spells to cast, create your own magic potions.
